Well... CSGO. 
1. You join a server
2. You actually don't perform that bad
3. You get flamed on by some russian guy
4. You get tilted because his other russian friends now flame you aswell and you keep getting tk.
5. You kinda want to fight back but your four special teammates just radiate to much autism
6. open console ~ type "exit" or "disconnect" (preference) ~ press "Enter" on your keyboard

Now you have truly mastered CSGO and can cry yourself to sleep.

I play since 2013, it's a game that I keep constantly abandoning and coming back to play more. It's competitive and it's fun. Now with Valve actually paying attention to the game(Danger Zone, Shattered Web and constant updates) it gets even better. People complain about the cheaters but I rarely see one, must be, because of Prime and High Trust Factor. So if you start free to play, don't bother, after some time you will not see as many of them.
